events.message: The customer reported an auto accident involving their sedan which occurred last night at an intersection.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident after review of the initial report and damage description.
An agent specializing in auto claims was assigned to the case to provide expert assistance and guidance.
The insurance company acknowledged receipt of the claim and assured the customer that the process is underway.
The agent requested photos of the damaged vehicle, police report, and the driver's license to proceed with investigation.
Customer uploaded and submitted all required documents including detailed images and the official police report.
The investigation team began examining the evidence and interviewing involved parties regarding the collision.
The investigation into the accident circumstances and liability has been completed with all findings documented.
A fair settlement offer was proposed to cover the repair costs and associated expenses resulting from the accident.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the prompt processing and the settlement terms offered.
Official claim approval was granted following customer's consent to the proposed settlement amount.
Payment for the approved claim amount was issued and transferred to the customer's bank account.
The claim case was officially closed after confirmation of payment receipt and completion of all processes.
All claim documents and related correspondence were archived securely for future reference.
